entries.summary: Channel divine power to mend wounds. The gods, it turns out, have surprisingly practical applications beyond smiting the unfaithful and demanding tribute. This is the entry-level miracle: predictable, safe, and only occasionally prone to curing ailments the patient didn't know they had.
entries.description: Channel divine power to mend wounds. The gods, it turns out, have surprisingly practical applications beyond smiting the unfaithful and demanding tribute. This is the entry-level miracle: predictable, safe, and only occasionally prone to curing ailments the patient didn't know they had.

entries.summary: Your god reaches into the target and sets their bones with the tender care of someone who designed the skeletal system in the first place and knows exactly where everything goes. Hurts considerably more than regular healing. This is theologically classified as "building character."
entries.description: Your god reaches into the target and sets their bones with the tender care of someone who designed the skeletal system in the first place and knows exactly where everything goes. Hurts considerably more than regular healing. This is theologically classified as "building character."

entries.summary: Toxins are, fundamentally, just molecules in the wrong place. Your deity corrects this spatial misunderstanding. The poison doesn't vanishthat would violate conservation of massit simply finds itself suddenly outside the body, usually via the most expedient route. Standing downwind is inadvisable.
entries.description: Toxins are, fundamentally, just molecules in the wrong place. Your deity corrects this spatial misunderstanding. The poison doesn't vanishthat would violate conservation of massit simply finds itself suddenly outside the body, usually via the most expedient route. Standing downwind is inadvisable.

entries.summary: Disease is a theological problem: life consuming life in patterns the gods find aesthetically displeasing. You negotiate with your deity for corrective action. The prayer takes time because you're essentially filing form 77-D ("Request for Miraculous Intervention, Biological") in triplicate.
entries.description: Disease is a theological problem: life consuming life in patterns the gods find aesthetically displeasing. You negotiate with your deity for corrective action. The prayer takes time because you're essentially filing form 77-D ("Request for Miraculous Intervention, Biological") in triplicate.

entries.summary: Grant ongoing divine healing over time. The target becomes a small, temporary branch office of divine healing energy. Wounds close. Cells replicate with unusual enthusiasm. The effect fades after a minute, at which point biology resumes its normal pace of begrudging repair.
entries.description: Grant ongoing divine healing over time. The target becomes a small, temporary branch office of divine healing energy. Wounds close. Cells replicate with unusual enthusiasm. The effect fades after a minute, at which point biology resumes its normal pace of begrudging repair.

entries.summary: Regrowing lost limbs is technically possible, though it requires convincing your deity to essentially rewind local time for specific body parts while leaving the rest alone. The divine bureaucracy categorizes this as "Selective Temporal Reversal, Biological Only," which requires filling out seventeen forms and a personal letter explaining why you deserve fingers again.
entries.description: Regrowing lost limbs is technically possible, though it requires convincing your deity to essentially rewind local time for specific body parts while leaving the rest alone. The divine bureaucracy categorizes this as "Selective Temporal Reversal, Biological Only," which requires filling out seventeen forms and a personal letter explaining why you deserve fingers again.

entries.summary: Death, from a divine perspective, is more of a suggestion than a rule. Recently deceased individualswe're talking minutes here, not dayscan be persuaded to return if you ask very nicely and your god happens to be in a lenient mood. The formerly dead often report the experience as "deeply uncomfortable" and "theologically confusing."
entries.description: Death, from a divine perspective, is more of a suggestion than a rule. Recently deceased individualswe're talking minutes here, not dayscan be persuaded to return if you ask very nicely and your god happens to be in a lenient mood. The formerly dead often report the experience as "deeply uncomfortable" and "theologically confusing."

entries.summary: Bestow divine protection upon a target. The gods, when asked politely, will occasionally extend a metaphorical hand to deflect harm. This manifests as a faint shimmerbarely visiblethat suggests the universe is, for the next five minutes, mildly biased in the target's favor.
entries.description: Bestow divine protection upon a target. The gods, when asked politely, will occasionally extend a metaphorical hand to deflect harm. This manifests as a faint shimmerbarely visiblethat suggests the universe is, for the next five minutes, mildly biased in the target's favor.

entries.summary: Create a powerful divine shield around yourself. You become, temporarily, a walking templesacred ground that violence finds philosophically troubling. Attackers experience a profound sense that harming you would be in poor taste. Most take the hint.
entries.description: Create a powerful divine shield around yourself. You become, temporarily, a walking templesacred ground that violence finds philosophically troubling. Attackers experience a profound sense that harming you would be in poor taste. Most take the hint.

entries.summary: Inscribe a protective circle that repels malevolent entities. The boundary isn't physicalyou can't touch itbut spirits, demons, and other incorporeal nuisances find they simply can't cross. They mill about outside looking frustrated, which is deeply satisfying.
entries.description: Inscribe a protective circle that repels malevolent entities. The boundary isn't physicalyou can't touch itbut spirits, demons, and other incorporeal nuisances find they simply can't cross. They mill about outside looking frustrated, which is deeply satisfying.

entries.summary: Your certainty becomes armor. The strength of your beliefliteral, measurable faithcondenses into a translucent barrier. The more devout you are, the stronger it holds. Doubt weakens it. This is one of the few spells where sincerity is mechanically relevant.
entries.description: Your certainty becomes armor. The strength of your beliefliteral, measurable faithcondenses into a translucent barrier. The more devout you are, the stronger it holds. Doubt weakens it. This is one of the few spells where sincerity is mechanically relevant.

entries.summary: Call down divine wrath upon an enemy. Your deity, having observed the target's behavior and found it wanting, delivers corrective action in the form of concentrated holy energy. It's less "smiting" in the Old Testament sense and more "extremely firm celestial feedback."
entries.description: Call down divine wrath upon an enemy. Your deity, having observed the target's behavior and found it wanting, delivers corrective action in the form of concentrated holy energy. It's less "smiting" in the Old Testament sense and more "extremely firm celestial feedback."

entries.summary: Holy fire that burns the wicked. Theologically, this is fascinating: the flame discriminates based on moral standing. Innocents feel only warmth. The guilty burn. How it determines guilt remains a point of theological debate, though "asks the god directly" seems likely.
entries.description: Holy fire that burns the wicked. Theologically, this is fascinating: the flame discriminates based on moral standing. Innocents feel only warmth. The guilty burn. How it determines guilt remains a point of theological debate, though "asks the god directly" seems likely.

entries.summary: A column of pure divine energy descends from the heavens. Subtle it is not. The entire neighborhood notices. Birds flee. The pious prostrate themselves. The guilty reconsider their life choices. The spell is less about damagethough there's plentyand more about making a point.
entries.description: A column of pure divine energy descends from the heavens. Subtle it is not. The entire neighborhood notices. Birds flee. The pious prostrate themselves. The guilty reconsider their life choices. The spell is less about damagethough there's plentyand more about making a point.

entries.summary: Forcibly relocate an unwanted entity to another plane of existence. Your god essentially files an eviction notice with cosmic bureaucracy. Demons, spirits, and other planar tourists find themselves suddenly elsewhereusually their home dimension, occasionally somewhere embarrassing.
entries.description: Forcibly relocate an unwanted entity to another plane of existence. Your god essentially files an eviction notice with cosmic bureaucracy. Demons, spirits, and other planar tourists find themselves suddenly elsewhereusually their home dimension, occasionally somewhere embarrassing.

entries.summary: The undead, being fundamentally contrary to the natural order, find divine energy deeply unpleasant. You channel your god's disapproval directly at them. Lesser undead flee. Stronger ones flinch. The truly powerful ones look mildly annoyed, which is still something.
entries.description: The undead, being fundamentally contrary to the natural order, find divine energy deeply unpleasant. You channel your god's disapproval directly at them. Lesser undead flee. Stronger ones flinch. The truly powerful ones look mildly annoyed, which is still something.

entries.summary: Imbue a weapon with divine favor. The blade doesn't glowthat would be tackybut it cuts with the certainty of righteousness. Particularly effective against creatures who are, technically speaking, abominations. Regular mortals notice only that you seem unusually confident.
entries.description: Imbue a weapon with divine favor. The blade doesn't glowthat would be tackybut it cuts with the certainty of righteousness. Particularly effective against creatures who are, technically speaking, abominations. Regular mortals notice only that you seem unusually confident.

entries.summary: Fear, from a divine perspective, is a failure of perspective. You grant targets the ability to see their situation through divine eyesspecifically, eyes that know how the story ends. Courage becomes less an emotion and more a rational assessment that everything will, probably, work out.
entries.description: Fear, from a divine perspective, is a failure of perspective. You grant targets the ability to see their situation through divine eyesspecifically, eyes that know how the story ends. Courage becomes less an emotion and more a rational assessment that everything will, probably, work out.

entries.summary: The target becomes temporarily more durablenot stronger, but harder to break. Exhaustion happens more slowly. Pain feels distant. This isn't numbing; the body still reports damage, but the divine override says "noted, continuing anyway."
entries.description: The target becomes temporarily more durablenot stronger, but harder to break. Exhaustion happens more slowly. Pain feels distant. This isn't numbing; the body still reports damage, but the divine override says "noted, continuing anyway."

entries.summary: Grant temporary divine insight. The target experiences ten minutes of unusual claritynot intelligence exactly, but the ability to see patterns, connections, and which decisions are profoundly stupid. Afterward, they often report feeling "disappointed in past me."
entries.description: Grant temporary divine insight. The target experiences ten minutes of unusual claritynot intelligence exactly, but the ability to see patterns, connections, and which decisions are profoundly stupid. Afterward, they often report feeling "disappointed in past me."

entries.summary: Evil, it turns out, has a distinct metaphysical scent. Not literal smellmore like a wrongness that catches in your divine perception. You detect creatures and objects that offend cosmic order. This is surprisingly useful, though "radiates evil" is sometimes just "having a bad day."
entries.description: Evil, it turns out, has a distinct metaphysical scent. Not literal smellmore like a wrongness that catches in your divine perception. You detect creatures and objects that offend cosmic order. This is surprisingly useful, though "radiates evil" is sometimes just "having a bad day."

entries.summary: Ask your deity for guidance about a proposed course of action. The response comes as intuition: "favorable," "unfavorable," or "the gods are busy, try again later." Accuracy varies. Deities see futures as probability clouds, not certainties. Free will remains inconveniently relevant.
entries.description: Ask your deity for guidance about a proposed course of action. The response comes as intuition: "favorable," "unfavorable," or "the gods are busy, try again later." Accuracy varies. Deities see futures as probability clouds, not certainties. Free will remains inconveniently relevant.

entries.summary: Grant understanding of all languages. The spell doesn't teach languagesthat would take yearsit simply routes all speech through divine translation services. Words you hear emerge in your native tongue. Words you speak arrive in the listener's. The gods' customer service, it seems, includes interpretation.
entries.description: Grant understanding of all languages. The spell doesn't teach languagesthat would take yearsit simply routes all speech through divine translation services. Words you hear emerge in your native tongue. Words you speak arrive in the listener's. The gods' customer service, it seems, includes interpretation.

entries.summary: Render water safe and pure. Contaminants don't vanishthey transform into harmless sediment that settles at the bottom. The water itself gains a faint shimmer, the visual equivalent of "blessed by management." Tastes slightly better than normal. Theologians debate whether this is placebo or genuine divine enhancement.
entries.description: Render water safe and pure. Contaminants don't vanishthey transform into harmless sediment that settles at the bottom. The water itself gains a faint shimmer, the visual equivalent of "blessed by management." Tastes slightly better than normal. Theologians debate whether this is placebo or genuine divine enhancement.

entries.summary: Declare an area sacred to your deity. The ground becomes holynot metaphorically, but in ways that affect local reality. Undead feel uncomfortable. Fiends avoid it. The faithful gain subtle benefits. Desecrating consecrated ground requires significant effort and is considered extremely rude.
entries.description: Declare an area sacred to your deity. The ground becomes holynot metaphorically, but in ways that affect local reality. Undead feel uncomfortable. Fiends avoid it. The faithful gain subtle benefits. Desecrating consecrated ground requires significant effort and is considered extremely rude.

entries.summary: Curses are, essentially, persistent negative contracts with reality. You petition your deity to void the contract. Simple curses dissolve immediately. Complex ones require negotiation. Ancient curses sometimes have divine legal teams and counterclaim for breach of cosmic contract.
entries.description: Curses are, essentially, persistent negative contracts with reality. You petition your deity to void the contract. Simple curses dissolve immediately. Complex ones require negotiation. Ancient curses sometimes have divine legal teams and counterclaim for breach of cosmic contract.

entries.summary: Create a small flame. Your first real spell, and it's delightfully simple: channel mana into heat, concentrate it at a point, watch combustion happen. Every wizard remembers their first Igniteusually because they set something on fire that wasn't supposed to burn.
entries.description: Create a small flame. Your first real spell, and it's delightfully simple: channel mana into heat, concentrate it at a point, watch combustion happen. Every wizard remembers their first Igniteusually because they set something on fire that wasn't supposed to burn.

entries.summary: Project flame at a target. Ignite, but with trajectory. You're essentially throwing heatnot physically hurling fire, but convincing reality that fire should exist over there instead of here. Distance introduces complications. Wind exists. Targets move. Advanced students learn to compensate.
entries.description: Project flame at a target. Ignite, but with trajectory. You're essentially throwing heatnot physically hurling fire, but convincing reality that fire should exist over there instead of here. Distance introduces complications. Wind exists. Targets move. Advanced students learn to compensate.

entries.summary: The classic. Every wizard's favorite. Create a sphere of concentrated fire and hurl it at your enemies. It explodes on impact, because fire, when compressed enough, has opinions about being compressed. Academies teach Fireball in year three. Rebuilding what students destroy takes year four.
entries.description: The classic. Every wizard's favorite. Create a sphere of concentrated fire and hurl it at your enemies. It explodes on impact, because fire, when compressed enough, has opinions about being compressed. Academies teach Fireball in year three. Rebuilding what students destroy takes year four.

entries.summary: Summon a vertical sheet of fire. It hangs in the air, burning nothing but itself, sustained by continuous mana feed. Crossing it is painful but technically possible if you're fast and desperate. The wall serves less as absolute barrier and more as "strong suggestion to go another way."
entries.description: Summon a vertical sheet of fire. It hangs in the air, burning nothing but itself, sustained by continuous mana feed. Crossing it is painful but technically possible if you're fast and desperate. The wall serves less as absolute barrier and more as "strong suggestion to go another way."

entries.summary: The theoretical maximum of fire magic: spontaneous, complete combustion of everything in a targeted area. Air ignites. Stone melts. Witnesses report seeing the sun touch ground. The Academy officially forbids teaching this spell, which is exactly why advanced students research it anyway.
entries.description: The theoretical maximum of fire magic: spontaneous, complete combustion of everything in a targeted area. Air ignites. Stone melts. Witnesses report seeing the sun touch ground. The Academy officially forbids teaching this spell, which is exactly why advanced students research it anyway.

entries.summary: Freeze what you touch. Thermodynamically questionableyou're removing heat faster than radiation alone explainsbut it works. Students practice on water. Competent casters freeze enemies' hands. Master casters create ice sculptures. All equally valid applications of thermal manipulation.
entries.description: Freeze what you touch. Thermodynamically questionableyou're removing heat faster than radiation alone explainsbut it works. Students practice on water. Competent casters freeze enemies' hands. Master casters create ice sculptures. All equally valid applications of thermal manipulation.

entries.summary: Project freezing energy at range. Ice magic, unlike fire, is subtle. No flames, no explosionjust rapid thermal drain. Targets feel cold spreading through them, movement slowing as cellular water crystallizes. Less dramatic than fire. More effective at making people reconsider their choices.
entries.description: Project freezing energy at range. Ice magic, unlike fire, is subtle. No flames, no explosionjust rapid thermal drain. Targets feel cold spreading through them, movement slowing as cellular water crystallizes. Less dramatic than fire. More effective at making people reconsider their choices.

entries.summary: Condense water vapor into a spear of solid ice and hurl it. It's both projectile and cold damagekinetic impact plus thermal drain. The spear shatters on contact, fragments embedding in target. Physics teachers use this as an example of "elegantly efficient violence."
entries.description: Condense water vapor into a spear of solid ice and hurl it. It's both projectile and cold damagekinetic impact plus thermal drain. The spear shatters on contact, fragments embedding in target. Physics teachers use this as an example of "elegantly efficient violence."

entries.summary: Summon winter in a fifteen-foot radius. Wind, snow, plummeting temperatureall the worst parts of a blizzard without requiring actual weather. Inside the effect, visibility drops to inches. Movement becomes treacherous. You, having cast it, know exactly where everything is. Your enemies do not.
entries.description: Summon winter in a fifteen-foot radius. Wind, snow, plummeting temperatureall the worst parts of a blizzard without requiring actual weather. Inside the effect, visibility drops to inches. Movement becomes treacherous. You, having cast it, know exactly where everything is. Your enemies do not.

entries.summary: Drain thermal energy so completely that molecular motion nearly stops. Theoretically impossibleyou can't actually reach absolute zerobut you can get close enough that the difference stops mattering. Everything in the area becomes brittle as glass. Touch it and it shatters. Beautiful. Horrifying. Very illegal in populated areas.
entries.description: Drain thermal energy so completely that molecular motion nearly stops. Theoretically impossibleyou can't actually reach absolute zerobut you can get close enough that the difference stops mattering. Everything in the area becomes brittle as glass. Touch it and it shatters. Beautiful. Horrifying. Very illegal in populated areas.

entries.summary: Create a small static discharge. Useful for lighting candles, annoying colleagues, and demonstrating basic principles of electrical magic. The spell every apprentice learns while their teacher explains voltage, current, and why you shouldn't practice this in the bath.
entries.description: Create a small static discharge. Useful for lighting candles, annoying colleagues, and demonstrating basic principles of electrical magic. The spell every apprentice learns while their teacher explains voltage, current, and why you shouldn't practice this in the bath.

entries.summary: Channel electricity through touch. Your hand becomes a live wire. Contact delivers a painful joltnot enough to kill (usually), but enough to make most people reconsider whatever they were doing. Particularly effective on enemies in metal armor, which becomes unhelpfully conductive.
entries.description: Channel electricity through touch. Your hand becomes a live wire. Contact delivers a painful joltnot enough to kill (usually), but enough to make most people reconsider whatever they were doing. Particularly effective on enemies in metal armor, which becomes unhelpfully conductive.

entries.summary: Call down lightning. Not metaphorical lightningactual electrical discharge. You create a potential difference so extreme that reality responds with a bolt. Instantaneous. Loud. Leaves a smell of ozone and singed regrets. The spell that makes you feel like a storm god, at least for a moment.
entries.description: Call down lightning. Not metaphorical lightningactual electrical discharge. You create a potential difference so extreme that reality responds with a bolt. Instantaneous. Loud. Leaves a smell of ozone and singed regrets. The spell that makes you feel like a storm god, at least for a moment.

entries.summary: Lightning that jumps between targets. You provide the initial bolt; physics handles distribution. Current seeks the path of least resistance, which usually means "the next closest enemy." Each jump weakens the charge, but three or four targets still receive attention. Extremely satisfying against groups.
entries.description: Lightning that jumps between targets. You provide the initial bolt; physics handles distribution. Current seeks the path of least resistance, which usually means "the next closest enemy." Each jump weakens the charge, but three or four targets still receive attention. Extremely satisfying against groups.

entries.summary: Summon an actual storm. Clouds gather. Wind rises. Rain falls. Lightning strikes wherever you direct it, which is as close to godhood as mortal magic gets. The storm persists for half an hour, weather permitting. Local meteorologists despise this spell. Farmers have mixed feelings.
entries.description: Summon an actual storm. Clouds gather. Wind rises. Rain falls. Lightning strikes wherever you direct it, which is as close to godhood as mortal magic gets. The storm persists for half an hour, weather permitting. Local meteorologists despise this spell. Farmers have mixed feelings.

entries.summary: Repair small breaks in inanimate objects. You're not fixing themyou're convincing them to remember being whole and return to that state. Works on torn cloth, cracked pottery, snapped wood. The repair is real, permanent, and often leaves no seam. Your mother would be so proud.
entries.description: Repair small breaks in inanimate objects. You're not fixing themyou're convincing them to remember being whole and return to that state. Works on torn cloth, cracked pottery, snapped wood. The repair is real, permanent, and often leaves no seam. Your mother would be so proud.

entries.summary: Mold stone like clay. The rock becomes temporarily plasticnot liquid, just... compliant. You have about a minute to shape it before molecular structure reasserts itself. Sculptors use this for art. Practical wizards use it for making doors where there weren't doors before.
entries.description: Mold stone like clay. The rock becomes temporarily plasticnot liquid, just... compliant. You have about a minute to shape it before molecular structure reasserts itself. Sculptors use this for art. Practical wizards use it for making doors where there weren't doors before.

entries.summary: Change one substance into a similar substance. Wood to stone. Iron to copper. Water to wine, if you're feeling biblical. The effect is temporaryan hour, maybeand you can't violate conservation of mass. But for that hour, you've convinced reality that this is, in fact, that.
entries.description: Change one substance into a similar substance. Wood to stone. Iron to copper. Water to wine, if you're feeling biblical. The effect is temporaryan hour, maybeand you can't violate conservation of mass. But for that hour, you've convinced reality that this is, in fact, that.

entries.summary: Make something bigger. The target doubles in size, which means eight times the massphysics makes this complicated. Clothes stretch. Strength increases proportionally. The spell ends after ten minutes, at which point shrinking back happens suddenly and is reportedly "deeply uncomfortable."
entries.description: Make something bigger. The target doubles in size, which means eight times the massphysics makes this complicated. Clothes stretch. Strength increases proportionally. The spell ends after ten minutes, at which point shrinking back happens suddenly and is reportedly "deeply uncomfortable."

entries.summary: Transform a creature into a different creature. This is the big onethe spell that makes your teacher warn about "playing god." The target's mind stays intact; their body becomes something else entirely. Sheep are traditional. Half an hour later, they're themselves again, traumatized but educated.
entries.description: Transform a creature into a different creature. This is the big onethe spell that makes your teacher warn about "playing god." The target's mind stays intact; their body becomes something else entirely. Sheep are traditional. Half an hour later, they're themselves again, traumatized but educated.

entries.summary: Summon a disc of force that floats near you, intercepting blows. It's not a physical shieldmore like hardened space. Arrows deflect. Swords skid off. The shield moves with you, anticipating danger. This is the spell that lets wizards pretend they don't need armor.
entries.description: Summon a disc of force that floats near you, intercepting blows. It's not a physical shieldmore like hardened space. Arrows deflect. Swords skid off. The shield moves with you, anticipating danger. This is the spell that lets wizards pretend they don't need armor.

entries.summary: Create a light protective barrier around yourself. Think of it as magical bubble wrap: it absorbs small impacts, deflects minor hazards, makes you generally harder to hurt. Won't stop a sword, but it might turn a killing blow into merely terrible.
entries.description: Create a light protective barrier around yourself. Think of it as magical bubble wrap: it absorbs small impacts, deflects minor hazards, makes you generally harder to hurt. Won't stop a sword, but it might turn a killing blow into merely terrible.

entries.summary: Create a powerful protective shield. This is Minor Ward's ambitious older siblingthicker barrier, longer duration, better coverage. You could walk through a battlefield with this and emerge annoyed but unharmed. Arrows bounce. Spells dissipate. Swords ring uselessly.
entries.description: Create a powerful protective shield. This is Minor Ward's ambitious older siblingthicker barrier, longer duration, better coverage. You could walk through a battlefield with this and emerge annoyed but unharmed. Arrows bounce. Spells dissipate. Swords ring uselessly.

entries.summary: Unravel another mage's spell. You're essentially untying magical knotspulling apart the structure until it collapses. Simple spells dissolve easily. Complex ones resist. Ancient enchantments sometimes have the magical equivalent of security systems. Still, when it works, watching your enemy's magic simply stop is deeply satisfying.
entries.description: Unravel another mage's spell. You're essentially untying magical knotspulling apart the structure until it collapses. Simple spells dissolve easily. Complex ones resist. Ancient enchantments sometimes have the magical equivalent of security systems. Still, when it works, watching your enemy's magic simply stop is deeply satisfying.

entries.summary: Interrupt a spell as it's being cast. You identify the structure mid-formation and inject chaos at exactly the right moment. The enemy spell collapses. Their mana wastes. You smile smugly. This is the spell that makes wizard duels interestingwhen neither side can complete their favorite techniques.
entries.description: Interrupt a spell as it's being cast. You identify the structure mid-formation and inject chaos at exactly the right moment. The enemy spell collapses. Their mana wastes. You smile smugly. This is the spell that makes wizard duels interestingwhen neither side can complete their favorite techniques.

entries.summary: Create a zone where magic simply doesn't work. No spells in. No spells out. Existing enchantments suppress. It's the magical equivalent of a dead zonereality enforcing mundane physics only. Inside, wizards are just people with pointy hats and expensive education. Humbling. Sometimes necessary.
entries.description: Create a zone where magic simply doesn't work. No spells in. No spells out. Existing enchantments suppress. It's the magical equivalent of a dead zonereality enforcing mundane physics only. Inside, wizards are just people with pointy hats and expensive education. Humbling. Sometimes necessary.

entries.summary: Create illusory sound. Voices. Footsteps. Screaming. Whatever you imagine. The sound is realair actually vibratesbut the source is fictional. Useful for distraction, misdirection, and convincing people there's someone else in the room. The first spell of every competent liar.
entries.description: Create illusory sound. Voices. Footsteps. Screaming. Whatever you imagine. The sound is realair actually vibratesbut the source is fictional. Useful for distraction, misdirection, and convincing people there's someone else in the room. The first spell of every competent liar.

entries.summary: Create a simple visual illusion. A chair that isn't there. A door where there's wall. The image is staticno movementand breaks if touched. But for pure "make people see something false," this is your entry point. Apprentices practice by hiding their spell components from teachers.
entries.description: Create a simple visual illusion. A chair that isn't there. A door where there's wall. The image is staticno movementand breaks if touched. But for pure "make people see something false," this is your entry point. Apprentices practice by hiding their spell components from teachers.

entries.summary: Bend light around the target until they can't be seen. Not actual transparencythe matter's still therebut perfect optical camouflage. Ten minutes of being unseen. Ends if you attack someone, which is fair. Invisible assassins would be unreasonably overpowered, even by wizard standards.
entries.description: Bend light around the target until they can't be seen. Not actual transparencythe matter's still therebut perfect optical camouflage. Ten minutes of being unseen. Ends if you attack someone, which is fair. Invisible assassins would be unreasonably overpowered, even by wizard standards.

entries.summary: Create a complex, moving illusion. People, creatures, landscapesanything visual and auditory. The illusion responds to your mental direction, moves naturally, seems real. Touch still breaks it, but from a distance, it's indistinguishable from reality. The spell that makes reality optional.
entries.description: Create a complex, moving illusion. People, creatures, landscapesanything visual and auditory. The illusion responds to your mental direction, moves naturally, seems real. Touch still breaks it, but from a distance, it's indistinguishable from reality. The spell that makes reality optional.

entries.summary: Create an illusion so terrifying that the target's mind makes it real. Only they can see ittheir personal nightmare given form. If they believe it can kill them, their body might agree. Psychosomatic damage. Ethically questionable. Horrifyingly effective. The Academy debates banning this spell annually.
entries.description: Create an illusion so terrifying that the target's mind makes it real. Only they can see ittheir personal nightmare given form. If they believe it can kill them, their body might agree. Psychosomatic damage. Ethically questionable. Horrifyingly effective. The Academy debates banning this spell annually.

entries.summary: Sense magical auras in the area. Active spells shimmer. Enchanted objects glow faintly. You see the invisible infrastructure of magic that pervades everything. It's like developing new sensessuddenly the world is full of light only you can see. First-time casters often report feeling "less alone."
entries.description: Sense magical auras in the area. Active spells shimmer. Enchanted objects glow faintly. You see the invisible infrastructure of magic that pervades everything. It's like developing new sensessuddenly the world is full of light only you can see. First-time casters often report feeling "less alone."

entries.summary: Understand what a magical item does. You examine the enchantment's structure, trace its patterns, read its purpose like text. Simple items reveal themselves immediately. Complex artifacts require interpretation. Ancient relics sometimes respond poorly to unauthorized analysis. Still, usually worth the risk.
entries.description: Understand what a magical item does. You examine the enchantment's structure, trace its patterns, read its purpose like text. Simple items reveal themselves immediately. Complex artifacts require interpretation. Ancient relics sometimes respond poorly to unauthorized analysis. Still, usually worth the risk.

entries.summary: See a distant location as if you were there. You create an invisible sensora point of perceptionand route its input to your mind. See through walls. Scout ahead. Spy on conversations. Deeply useful. Thoroughly invasive. Illegal in most civilized nations without a warrant.
entries.description: See a distant location as if you were there. You create an invisible sensora point of perceptionand route its input to your mind. See through walls. Scout ahead. Spy on conversations. Deeply useful. Thoroughly invasive. Illegal in most civilized nations without a warrant.

entries.summary: Accelerate natural healing in a target. You're not divineyou can't perform miraclesbut you can convince cells to repair faster. Wounds close. Bones knit. The body does what it normally does, just much quicker. Academic healing lacks divine grace but makes up for it with reliable, reproducible results.
entries.description: Accelerate natural healing in a target. You're not divineyou can't perform miraclesbut you can convince cells to repair faster. Wounds close. Bones knit. The body does what it normally does, just much quicker. Academic healing lacks divine grace but makes up for it with reliable, reproducible results.

entries.summary: Grant gradual health regeneration over time. For the next ten minutes, the target heals continuouslyslowly, but steadily. Minor wounds close completely. Major ones improve significantly. It's maintenance healing: keeping people alive through prolonged danger rather than dramatic recovery.
entries.description: Grant gradual health regeneration over time. For the next ten minutes, the target heals continuouslyslowly, but steadily. Minor wounds close completely. Major ones improve significantly. It's maintenance healing: keeping people alive through prolonged danger rather than dramatic recovery.

entries.summary: Pay in blood for power. You open a small cutnothing dramatic, just enough to matterand the magic responds. Blood has memory. Blood has weight. The universe accepts it as currency. This is the fundamental exchange: your vitality for immediate effect. The cut heals, but the cost remains.
entries.description: Pay in blood for power. You open a small cutnothing dramatic, just enough to matterand the magic responds. Blood has memory. Blood has weight. The universe accepts it as currency. This is the fundamental exchange: your vitality for immediate effect. The cut heals, but the cost remains.

entries.summary: Shape your blood into a projectile. It leaves your body as liquid and hardens mid-flight into something like glasssharp, fast, deeply personal. The bolt carries a fragment of your life force. Hits harder than it should. Leaves enemies unsettled in ways normal weapons don't.
entries.description: Shape your blood into a projectile. It leaves your body as liquid and hardens mid-flight into something like glasssharp, fast, deeply personal. The bolt carries a fragment of your life force. Hits harder than it should. Leaves enemies unsettled in ways normal weapons don't.

entries.summary: Mingle your blood with another's. For the next hour, you share woundsdamage to either distributes between both. Useful for protecting the fragile. Terrifying when you realize your enemy can hurt you by hurting themselves. Blood bonds are intimate magic, whether you want them to be or not.
entries.description: Mingle your blood with another's. For the next hour, you share woundsdamage to either distributes between both. Useful for protecting the fragile. Terrifying when you realize your enemy can hurt you by hurting themselves. Blood bonds are intimate magic, whether you want them to be or not.

entries.summary: Control someone through their blood. You don't possess their mindthat's different magicbut you can pull their limbs, force movement, make the body betray its owner. Deeply unpleasant for everyone involved. The kind of spell that gets you banned from civilized society. Works beautifully.
entries.description: Control someone through their blood. You don't possess their mindthat's different magicbut you can pull their limbs, force movement, make the body betray its owner. Deeply unpleasant for everyone involved. The kind of spell that gets you banned from civilized society. Works beautifully.

entries.summary: Take someone's wounds into yourself. Their injuries close; yours open. The damage doesn't vanishconservation of sufferingbut it redistributes. Profoundly useful. Possibly heroic. Definitely hurts. Blood mages report this is either the kindest or cruelest spell they know, depending on context.
entries.description: Take someone's wounds into yourself. Their injuries close; yours open. The damage doesn't vanishconservation of sufferingbut it redistributes. Profoundly useful. Possibly heroic. Definitely hurts. Blood mages report this is either the kindest or cruelest spell they know, depending on context.

entries.summary: Raise the temperature of someone's blood. Not metaphoricallyliterally heating hemoglobin until it bubbles. The target feels fever spike into agony. Most lose consciousness within seconds. Mortality rate is high. This is the spell that makes people understand why blood magic is feared.
entries.description: Raise the temperature of someone's blood. Not metaphoricallyliterally heating hemoglobin until it bubbles. The target feels fever spike into agony. Most lose consciousness within seconds. Mortality rate is high. This is the spell that makes people understand why blood magic is feared.

entries.summary: Find someone through blood connection. Given a samplea drop, a smearyou trace back to its source. Blood knows where it came from. You follow that knowledge across any distance. Privacy laws hate this spell. Detectives love it. Everyone agrees it's uncomfortably effective.
entries.description: Find someone through blood connection. Given a samplea drop, a smearyou trace back to its source. Blood knows where it came from. You follow that knowledge across any distance. Privacy laws hate this spell. Detectives love it. Everyone agrees it's uncomfortably effective.

entries.summary: Burn your life force for temporary strength. Muscles swell. Reflexes sharpen. You become briefly superhuman by converting longevity into immediate capability. The effect fades after five minutes. You'll feel it laterexhaustion, accelerated aging, the bill coming due. Worth it in emergencies.
entries.description: Burn your life force for temporary strength. Muscles swell. Reflexes sharpen. You become briefly superhuman by converting longevity into immediate capability. The effect fades after five minutes. You'll feel it laterexhaustion, accelerated aging, the bill coming due. Worth it in emergencies.

entries.summary: Accelerate your healing to unnatural rates. Wounds close in seconds. Broken bones set themselves. You're burning through vitality reserves normally saved for decades of life. Ten minutes of regeneration might cost weeks off your lifespan. The math is unfavorable but the alternative is death.
entries.description: Accelerate your healing to unnatural rates. Wounds close in seconds. Broken bones set themselves. You're burning through vitality reserves normally saved for decades of life. Ten minutes of regeneration might cost weeks off your lifespan. The math is unfavorable but the alternative is death.

entries.summary: Steal life force through contact. Your touch draws vitality from the target into yourself. Their wounds become your healing. Their exhaustion becomes your energy. Technically not vampirismyou're not drinking bloodbut the emotional experience is similar. Most targets strongly object.
entries.description: Steal life force through contact. Your touch draws vitality from the target into yourself. Their wounds become your healing. Their exhaustion becomes your energy. Technically not vampirismyou're not drinking bloodbut the emotional experience is similar. Most targets strongly object.

entries.summary: Say the true name of fire. Not "fire" in human languagethe actual name, the word that fire recognizes as itself. Spoken correctly, fire obeys. You don't create flames; you call them into being by addressing them directly. They come because you know what to say.
entries.description: Say the true name of fire. Not "fire" in human languagethe actual name, the word that fire recognizes as itself. Spoken correctly, fire obeys. You don't create flames; you call them into being by addressing them directly. They come because you know what to say.

entries.summary: Speak wind's name and it listens. Gentle breeze or roaring galeit depends on your tone. Wind is capricious, more playful than fire, but bound by the same principle: true names compel. You ask nicely in the language of creation and wind, flattered by recognition, complies.
entries.description: Speak wind's name and it listens. Gentle breeze or roaring galeit depends on your tone. Wind is capricious, more playful than fire, but bound by the same principle: true names compel. You ask nicely in the language of creation and wind, flattered by recognition, complies.

entries.summary: Know a spirit's true name and you own itnot possession, but binding. The name is a leash, a contract written into cosmic fabric. The spirit must obey direct commands for half an hour. Afterward, it remembers. Most spirits find this deeply humiliating and hold impressive grudges.
entries.description: Know a spirit's true name and you own itnot possession, but binding. The name is a leash, a contract written into cosmic fabric. The spirit must obey direct commands for half an hour. Afterward, it remembers. Most spirits find this deeply humiliating and hold impressive grudges.

entries.summary: Address stone by its true name and it becomes malleable. You're not changing ityou're asking it to change. Stone is patient, slow, but responsive when spoken to correctly. It flows, reshapes, creates passages. The effect is permanent because you've negotiated with stone itself.
entries.description: Address stone by its true name and it becomes malleable. You're not changing ityou're asking it to change. Stone is patient, slow, but responsive when spoken to correctly. It flows, reshapes, creates passages. The effect is permanent because you've negotiated with stone itself.

entries.summary: Speak the true name of your target and your attack cannot miss. You're not improving aimyou're invoking metaphysical certainty. The name creates connection. The weapon follows connection to conclusion. Reality adjusts to make the statement "this hits" factually correct.
entries.description: Speak the true name of your target and your attack cannot miss. You're not improving aimyou're invoking metaphysical certainty. The name creates connection. The weapon follows connection to conclusion. Reality adjusts to make the statement "this hits" factually correct.

entries.summary: Learn an object's true name through study. Two minutes of focused attentiontouching it, examining it, listening to what it is beneath what it seems. The name emerges as intuition, as knowing without being told. Simple objects have simple names. Ancient artifacts have names like poetry.
entries.description: Learn an object's true name through study. Two minutes of focused attentiontouching it, examining it, listening to what it is beneath what it seems. The name emerges as intuition, as knowing without being told. Simple objects have simple names. Ancient artifacts have names like poetry.

entries.summary: Learn someone's true name. This takes timeconversation, observation, understanding who they really are beneath masks and pretense. When you finally hear it (and you will hear it, silent but certain), you gain power over them. They'll know immediately. Trust never quite recovers.
entries.description: Learn someone's true name. This takes timeconversation, observation, understanding who they really are beneath masks and pretense. When you finally hear it (and you will hear it, silent but certain), you gain power over them. They'll know immediately. Trust never quite recovers.

entries.summary: Change your own true name. This is profound magicnot identity theft, but identity reformation. You become, at fundamental level, someone else. Old bindings break. Old connections sever. You escape fate, prediction, anyone who knew your old name. The cost is continuity: you're no longer quite who you were.
entries.description: Change your own true name. This is profound magicnot identity theft, but identity reformation. You become, at fundamental level, someone else. Old bindings break. Old connections sever. You escape fate, prediction, anyone who knew your old name. The cost is continuity: you're no longer quite who you were.

entries.summary: Say the true name of something backward. This is ontological deletionnot destroying, but asserting nonexistence. The thing hears its name inverted and, confused by the paradox, ceases. Works on objects, magical constructs, occasionally concepts. Living things resist fiercely. Reality finds this spell philosophically troubling.
entries.description: Say the true name of something backward. This is ontological deletionnot destroying, but asserting nonexistence. The thing hears its name inverted and, confused by the paradox, ceases. Works on objects, magical constructs, occasionally concepts. Living things resist fiercely. Reality finds this spell philosophically troubling.

entries.summary: Give rope the breath of life. You invest one Breatha fragment of your vital essenceand speak a Command. The rope wakes. Moves. Obeys. It's not alive, exactly, but animated. Autonomous. When the Breath fades after ten minutes, the rope returns to ordinary cordage, remembering nothing.
entries.description: Give rope the breath of life. You invest one Breatha fragment of your vital essenceand speak a Command. The rope wakes. Moves. Obeys. It's not alive, exactly, but animated. Autonomous. When the Breath fades after ten minutes, the rope returns to ordinary cordage, remembering nothing.

entries.summary: Breathe life into fabric. Cloaks become shields. Tapestries become walls. The cloth moves at your Commandwrapping, protecting, entangling. It drains color as it awakens; brilliant dyes fade to gray as life-force redistributes. The exchange is always visible: magic has aesthetic cost.
entries.description: Breathe life into fabric. Cloaks become shields. Tapestries become walls. The cloth moves at your Commandwrapping, protecting, entangling. It drains color as it awakens; brilliant dyes fade to gray as life-force redistributes. The exchange is always visible: magic has aesthetic cost.

entries.summary: Grant consciousness to smoke. This is advancedsmoke has no form, no structure, just particles suspended in air. Yet Awakened smoke moves with purpose, obscures specifically, forms shapes on command. Expensive. Beautiful. The kind of magic that makes spectators stop and stare.
entries.description: Grant consciousness to smoke. This is advancedsmoke has no form, no structure, just particles suspended in air. Yet Awakened smoke moves with purpose, obscures specifically, forms shapes on command. Expensive. Beautiful. The kind of magic that makes spectators stop and stare.

entries.summary: Accumulate fifty Breaths and reality notices. Your aura becomes visiblesubtle, but thereradiating vitality. Colors seem brighter near you. People unconsciously defer. This isn't a spell you cast; it's a state of being. The first step toward something more than human.
entries.description: Accumulate fifty Breaths and reality notices. Your aura becomes visiblesubtle, but thereradiating vitality. Colors seem brighter near you. People unconsciously defer. This isn't a spell you cast; it's a state of being. The first step toward something more than human.

entries.summary: Two hundred Breaths grants perfect pitch and color recognition. Your senses sharpennot superhuman, but perfectly calibrated. You hear harmonics others miss. See color gradations invisible to normal sight. Useful for Awakening, where precision matters. The world becomes more vivid.
entries.description: Two hundred Breaths grants perfect pitch and color recognition. Your senses sharpennot superhuman, but perfectly calibrated. You hear harmonics others miss. See color gradations invisible to normal sight. Useful for Awakening, where precision matters. The world becomes more vivid.

entries.summary: The fundamental defensive Command. Whatever you've Awakened interposes itself between you and harm. Awakened cloth becomes armor. Awakened rope becomes barrier. The magic is literal-mindedyou said "protect," it protects, even at cost of its own destruction.
entries.description: The fundamental defensive Command. Whatever you've Awakened interposes itself between you and harm. Awakened cloth becomes armor. Awakened rope becomes barrier. The magic is literal-mindedyou said "protect," it protects, even at cost of its own destruction.

entries.summary: Direct your Awakened creation to attack. The Command is simple; execution varies by medium. Awakened rope strangles. Awakened cloth smothers. Awakened smoke chokes. The magic interprets "strike" literally, creatively, often disturbingly. Specificity in Commands is recommended.
entries.description: Direct your Awakened creation to attack. The Command is simple; execution varies by medium. Awakened rope strangles. Awakened cloth smothers. Awakened smoke chokes. The magic interprets "strike" literally, creatively, often disturbingly. Specificity in Commands is recommended.

entries.summary: Make your Awakened object retrieve something. Point. Say "Fetch." The object obeys within its capabilities. Awakened rope slithers across floors, wraps around the target item, pulls it back. Simple. Useful. Makes you feel like you've trained reality itself to heel.
entries.description: Make your Awakened object retrieve something. Point. Say "Fetch." The object obeys within its capabilities. Awakened rope slithers across floors, wraps around the target item, pulls it back. Simple. Useful. Makes you feel like you've trained reality itself to heel.

entries.summary: Reclaim Breath from an Awakened object. The life drains away; the object becomes mundane again; your Breath returns intact. This is recycling on an ontological scaleno waste, just conversion. Most Awakeners treat Breath as currency, investing and recovering as needed.
entries.description: Reclaim Breath from an Awakened object. The life drains away; the object becomes mundane again; your Breath returns intact. This is recycling on an ontological scaleno waste, just conversion. Most Awakeners treat Breath as currency, investing and recovering as needed.

entries.summary: Reach across dimensional boundaries and summon something small. Imps are traditional. Sprites if you're optimistic. You offer termsusually service for service, equivalent exchange. The entity appears, hears your proposal, accepts or vanishes. Negotiations at the cosmic scale: surprisingly bureaucratic.
entries.description: Reach across dimensional boundaries and summon something small. Imps are traditional. Sprites if you're optimistic. You offer termsusually service for service, equivalent exchange. The entity appears, hears your proposal, accepts or vanishes. Negotiations at the cosmic scale: surprisingly bureaucratic.

entries.summary: Formalize a pact with metaphysical contract. Both parties agree to terms; you invoke this spell; reality enforces compliance. Break the contract and cosmic consequences followautomatic, impartial, often creative. This is magic as legal system: binding, bilateral, and absolutely serious.
entries.description: Formalize a pact with metaphysical contract. Both parties agree to terms; you invoke this spell; reality enforces compliance. Break the contract and cosmic consequences followautomatic, impartial, often creative. This is magic as legal system: binding, bilateral, and absolutely serious.

entries.summary: Ask your patron for direct intervention. This isn't prayerit's contractual obligation. You've paid (or are paying) for services; now you invoke them. Powerful entities respond according to agreement terms. Usually helpful. Occasionally pedantic about exact wording. Always watching the balance.
entries.description: Ask your patron for direct intervention. This isn't prayerit's contractual obligation. You've paid (or are paying) for services; now you invoke them. Powerful entities respond according to agreement terms. Usually helpful. Occasionally pedantic about exact wording. Always watching the balance.

entries.summary: Channel your patron's power temporarily. For five minutes, you're enhanced beyond mortal limitsstronger, faster, tougher. The power is lent, not given. You'll return it, possibly with interest depending on contract fine print. Reading the entire pact is always recommended. Few do.
entries.description: Channel your patron's power temporarily. For five minutes, you're enhanced beyond mortal limitsstronger, faster, tougher. The power is lent, not given. You'll return it, possibly with interest depending on contract fine print. Reading the entire pact is always recommended. Few do.

entries.summary: Place your patron's mark on a target. It's invisible to most, but your patron (and you) always know where they are. Tracking. Targeting. Sometimes protection, sometimes threat. The mark fades after half an hour unless made permanent through additional pact terms.
entries.description: Place your patron's mark on a target. It's invisible to most, but your patron (and you) always know where they are. Tracking. Targeting. Sometimes protection, sometimes threat. The mark fades after half an hour unless made permanent through additional pact terms.

entries.summary: Terminate a pact early. This is dangerousbreaking cosmic contracts has consequences. You'll pay penalties, lose benefits, possibly anger entities with long memories. But sometimes it's necessary. The spell severs the connection cleanly, if not kindly. Freedom has costs.
